articles.title: UK supermarkets face tomato shortages - BBC
articles.description: Harvests in Europe and Africa have been disrupted by bad weather, a retail body says.
articles.content:
Supplies of some fruit and vegetables, including tomatoes, to UK supermarkets have been disrupted by poor weather in Europe and Africa.
The British Retail Consortium (BRC) said that harvests had bee… [+1600 chars]
